CustomField.description: Created as a part of 2023 R4 enhancements (US-717). Entered upon case creation for grant approvals. Gets passed to the equivalent field on Opp when the case is Closed - Approved/Resolved. Tracks the staff member we're working with at the grantmaking org; not EDF staff.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Staff member(s) overseeing award at grantmaking institution.
CustomField.label: Program Officer
